Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Trigon" activates at the end of the Damage Step. It's considered the effect of a Spell Card.\n2. If "Trigon" is equipped to a monster that is not affected by Spell Cards, its effect to Special Summon a monster will still activate and resolve successfully.\n3. The effect of "Trigon" to Special Summon a monster starts a Chain.
